name: Choose The Dungeon
description:
Choose between exploring the dangerous dungeon or facing the fearsome Dungeon Boss.
But be careful the boss will not be easily defeated, make yourself stronger by exploring the dungeon and choose when to face him.

Credits
Game made by: TheDinoEmman
Game made for: Don Pachi Game jam 4 # with the theme "Riesgo y Recompensa"
Assets: Robert (0x72 Itch.io)
